name: F∪ck3r Gets Sum B!tch35
description:
This was made for Legend Media's Video Making Challenge or the VMC and was made with the free and beginner-friendly Gdevelop game engine, with all art made with Piskel by me.

The music track is "danger streets" by shiru8bit on OpenGameArt.com and the font is "Just a Dream" by Pizzadude.
